video.title: Sidonia no Kishi
video.synopsis: A hero rises to save a world that's also a spaceship under siege by an alien threat in this original anime series based on the popular manga comic.

episodes.synopsis: In isolation his entire life, Nagate must adjust to life in a centuries-old space colony while training as a cadet pilot to fight an ancient threat.
episodes.title: Commencement

episodes.synopsis: Nagate is haunted by his first combat experience against the Gauna. Later, he meets the elite pilots of Sidonia.
episodes.title: Oblivion

episodes.synopsis: Exploring Sidonia, Nagate makes an enemy of Kunato while protecting a friend. The Gauna attack, calling the pilots into action.
episodes.title: Glory

episodes.synopsis: After a disaster aboard Sidonia, Nagate and his team are ordered to retrieve a valued weapon. He later defies orders to save a friend.
episodes.title: Sacrifices

episodes.synopsis: Nagate and Shizuka, adrift in space, slowly run out of supplies as they await rescue from a departing Sidonia, which is too far away to send help.
episodes.title: Adrift

episodes.synopsis: Nagate and his squad graduate as pilots and are quickly sent into combat when the enemy returns; Kunato explores Nagate’s history.
episodes.title: Salutations

episodes.synopsis: The enemy is revealed to be even larger and deadlier than previously believed, resulting in three squads engaging in a deadly fight.
episodes.title: Resolve

episodes.synopsis: Nagate is blamed for a defeat and harbors guilt over a casualty; the early years of Sidonia are revealed.
episodes.title: Immortality

episodes.synopsis: The Gauna find a distressing way to demoralize and out-fight the attack force. Nagate returns to Sidonia with a prize that may help in the fight.
episodes.title: Empathy

episodes.synopsis: Pacifists endanger themselves by leaving the relative safety of Sidonia, while the enemy shows up larger and fiercer than before.
episodes.title: Decisions

episodes.synopsis: A large strike force encounters an enemy unit that takes them by surprise; Nagate does what he can to protect his friends.
episodes.title: Collision

episodes.synopsis: Nagate fights one-on-one with the heart of his enemy while the strike force does not fare well in its attack on the Gauna.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Pilot Nagate Tanikaze is now renowned for his actions in the recent battle, but Nagate is more concerned with the disappearance of the ena Hoshijiro.
episodes.title: Conflict

episodes.synopsis: Nagate and his team fight a hard battle against Gauna 549, aided by the appearance of a new type of gauna calling itself Tsumugi Shiraui.
episodes.title: Ability

episodes.synopsis: Having disposed of the opposition, Kobayashi sets Sidonia's course to the ninth planet in the nearby Lem System. All-out war now seems unavoidable.
episodes.title: Course

episodes.synopsis: A new threat appears in the form of Gauna 550, which has ejected countless lesser gauna cores on an intercept trajectory with Sidonia.
episodes.title: Rage

episodes.synopsis: Despite being instrumental in their victory, Tsumugi is severely damaged defending Sidonia. Izana, also critically injured, makes a bold decision.
episodes.title: Hope

episodes.synopsis: Evicted from his dorm and with nowhere to go, Nagate asks to stay with Izana for a night; Tsumugi has an emotional crisis triggered by a close call.
episodes.title: Engage

episodes.synopsis: The Sidonia's new weapon test succeeds, but the crew realizes they can't shut it down; Yuhata sends the garde pilots to investigate the disturbance.
episodes.title: Rumbling

episodes.synopsis: The pilots and Tsumugi repair damage to the Sidonia following the Gravitational Beam Emitter incident; Tsumugi is upset for causing a minor accident.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Izana finds out her "date" with Nagate was a setup and storms home. Soon after, she is called to be part of a team that will scout out Planet Nine.
episodes.title: Mission

episodes.synopsis: The reconnaissance team is attacked by the gauna; Izana and the squad leader manage to escape into the atmosphere of Planet Nine.
episodes.title: Entry

episodes.synopsis: Izana and the recon squad leader are pursued by an enormous humanoid gauna. Meanwhile, Tsumugi faces off against the Crimson Hawk Moth.
episodes.title: Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Nagate rescues Tsumugi but is overpowered by the Crimson Hawk Moth. The situation looks grim as swarms of gauna bear down on the survivors.
episodes.title: Battle
